problem: 如图,四边形ABCD是矩形,AC为⊙O的直径,过点B作⊙O的切线,与AC的延长线交于点P,若AC=10,∠P=30°,则AB的长度是()
answer: 解:如图,连接OB,∵BP是⊙O的切线,∴∠OBP=90°．又∠P=30°,∴∠BOP=60°,∴∠BAC=\frac{1}{2}∠BOP=30°．∵四边形ABCD是矩形,AC为⊙O的直径,AC=10,∴AB=AC•cos30°=10×\frac{√{3}}{2}=5√{3}．故选:D．
comment: 考查了矩形的性质和切线的性质．本题主要利用了切线的性质和锐角三角函数的概念解直角三角形问题．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, the quadrilateral ABCD is a rectangle, AC is the diameter of ⊙O, and the tangent line of ⊙O is made through point B, and the extended line of AC intersects at point P. If AC = N_0, ∠P = N_1, then the length of AB is ( )
